details.Allegations: Claimant alleges negligence and breach of fiduciary duty regarding options transactions from April 2017 through March 2020.
details.Broker Comment: The firm disputes the Claimant's allegations and intends to contest the claim vigorously. At all times, the representative acted reasonably and in pursuit of the Claimant's best interests.

alerts.description: Customer dispute on 8/28/2024. Resolution: Pending. Allegations: Claimant alleges negligence and breach of fiduciary duty regarding options transactions from April 2017 through March 2020.. Damage requested: $9,500,000.00. Settlement: Not specified

details.Allegations: Breach of Fiduciary Duty, Negligence, Fraud, Violation of the California Corporations Code, Violation of the Kansas Uniform Securities Act related to the sale of conservation easements, 2015-2017.
details.Broker Comment: After an extensive amount of research and analysis was completed by Claimants, and in consultation with their personal CPA and other professionals, they decided to make a non-discretionary investment outside of their accounts. Claimants were advised regarding the risks associated with this outside investment, both verbally and in writing, and they accepted those risks without reservation. The asserted claims are without merit and are wholly denied.

Damage requested: $5,185,000.00. Settlement: Not specified
